languages.text: Агитация, организованная слугами почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, возымела эффект. Е{mf|го|е} обращение к подданным транслировалось {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системами всей колонии, в городах были объявлены внеочередная нерабочая смена и раздача провизии, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекафа{/g} и индивидуальных топливных элементов. Вдохновленные милостью Лорд-капитана, обитатели колонии поспешили в развернутые исповедальные центры. Подполье вынуждено было спешно отступить из крупных городов.

traits.locale_text: Агитация, организованная слугами почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, возымела эффект. Е{mf|го|е} обращение к подданным транслировалось вокс-системами всей колонии, в городах были объявлены внеочередная нерабочая смена и раздача провизии, рекафа и индивидуальных топливных элементов. Вдохновленные милостью Лорд-капитана, обитатели колонии поспешили в развернутые исповедальные центры. Подполье вынуждено было спешно отступить из крупных городов.

languages.text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.
languages.original_text: Агитация, организованная слугами почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, возымела эффект. Е{mf|го|е} обращение к подданным транслировалось {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системами всей колонии, в городах были объявлены внеочередная нерабочая смена и раздача провизии, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекафа{/g} и индивидуальных топливных элементов. Вдохновленные милостью Лорд-капитана, обитатели колонии поспешили в развернутые исповедальные центры. Подполье вынуждено было спешно отступить из крупных городов.

traits.locale_text: The campaign organized by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by vox-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, recaff, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centers. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centers. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

languages.text: 偉大なるロード・キャプテンの仲間が計画した軍事計画は効果的だった。{mf|彼|彼女}が臣民に向けた自身の演説が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムによってコロニー全土に放送された。さらに町の労働者は労役の免除とともに食料、{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}模造コーヒー{/g}、個人用燃料電池の提供を受けた。ロード・キャプテンの厚意に心動かされたコロニー住民は、設立されて間もない贖罪センターに殺到した。その結果、反乱者の地下組織が都市部から急速に引き上げていった。
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: 偉大なるロード・キャプテンの仲間が計画した軍事計画は効果的だった。{mf|彼|彼女}が臣民に向けた自身の演説が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムによってコロニー全土に放送された。さらに町の労働者は労役の免除とともに食料、{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}模造コーヒー{/g}、個人用燃料電池の提供を受けた。ロード・キャプテンの厚意に心動かされたコロニー住民は、設立されて間もない贖罪センターに殺到した。その結果、反乱者の地下組織が都市部から急速に引き上げていった。

languages.text: 德高望重的舰长大人组织的这场行动起到了效果。{mf|他|她}向臣民们发表的演说，通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统广播到了整个殖民地。城镇中的工人们获得了休息时间，还得到了补给品、{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}雷卡咖啡{/g}与个人专用的燃料电池。殖民地的居民们被舰长大人的仁慈感动，纷纷涌向最近建立的忏悔中心。地下叛军被迫从主要城市匆忙撤退。
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: 德高望重的舰长大人组织的这场行动起到了效果。{mf|他|她}向臣民们发表的演说，通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统广播到了整个殖民地。城镇中的工人们获得了休息时间，还得到了补给品、{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}雷卡咖啡{/g}与个人专用的燃料电池。殖民地的居民们被舰长大人的仁慈感动，纷纷涌向最近建立的忏悔中心。地下叛军被迫从主要城市匆忙撤退。

languages.text: La campaña organizada por el personal {mf|del estimado Lord Capitán|de la estimada Lord Capitán} surtió efecto. La proclama fue transmitida por los sistemas de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} de toda la colonia; los trabajadores recibieron un ciclo de descanso y varias provisiones, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}café{/g} y células de combustible para uso personal. Conmovidos por la gentileza {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán}, los habitantes de la colonia acudieron en tropel a los centros de confesión recién inaugurados. La resistencia clandestina rebelde se vio obligada a huir precipitadamente de las principales ciudades.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: La campaña organizada por el personal {mf|del estimado Lord Capitán|de la estimada Lord Capitán} surtió efecto. La proclama fue transmitida por los sistemas de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} de toda la colonia; los trabajadores recibieron un ciclo de descanso y varias provisiones, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}café{/g} y células de combustible para uso personal. Conmovidos por la gentileza {mf|del Lord Capitán|de la Lord Capitán}, los habitantes de la colonia acudieron en tropel a los centros de confesión recién inaugurados. La resistencia clandestina rebelde se vio obligada a huir precipitadamente de las principales ciudades.

languages.text: Die von Leuten des geschätzten Lord Captain organisierte Kampagne zeigte Wirkung. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Ansprache an {mf|seine|ihre} Untertanen wurde von {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Systemen in der ganzen Kolonie übertragen, und die Arbeiter erhielten eine Schicht frei, Nahrung {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Rekaf{/g} und Treibstoffzellen für den Eigenbedarf. Von der Großzügigkeit des Lord Captain überwältigt, eilten die Einwohner der Kolonie zu den kürzlich eingerichteten Beichtzentren. Der Rebellenuntergrund sah sich gezwungen, sich rasch aus den größeren Städten zurückzuziehen.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: Die von Leuten des geschätzten Lord Captain organisierte Kampagne zeigte Wirkung. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Ansprache an {mf|seine|ihre} Untertanen wurde von {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Systemen in der ganzen Kolonie übertragen, und die Arbeiter erhielten eine Schicht frei, Nahrung {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Rekaf{/g} und Treibstoffzellen für den Eigenbedarf. Von der Großzügigkeit des Lord Captain überwältigt, eilten die Einwohner der Kolonie zu den kürzlich eingerichteten Beichtzentren. Der Rebellenuntergrund sah sich gezwungen, sich rasch aus den größeren Städten zurückzuziehen.

languages.text: La campagne organisée par le personnel de l'honorable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} fut lancée. Le discours qu'{mf|il|elle} adressa à ses sujets fut diffusé par systèmes-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} dans toute la colonie et les ouvriers des villes eurent exceptionnellement le droit de chômer pour l'écouter, en plus de recevoir des provisions, du {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g} et des cellules de carburant personnelles. Touchés par la bonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les habitants affluèrent dans les centres de confession nouvellement créés et le réseau clandestin des rebelles fut contraint de quitter les grandes villes en toute hâte.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.

traits.locale_text: La campagne organisée par le personnel de l'honorable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} fut lancée. Le discours qu'{mf|il|elle} adressa à ses sujets fut diffusé par systèmes-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} dans toute la colonie et les ouvriers des villes eurent exceptionnellement le droit de chômer pour l'écouter, en plus de recevoir des provisions, du {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g} et des cellules de carburant personnelles. Touchés par la bonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les habitants affluèrent dans les centres de confession nouvellement créés et le réseau clandestin des rebelles fut contraint de quitter les grandes villes en toute hâte.

languages.text: Muhterem Lord Kaptan'ın emrindekilerin düzenlediği kampanya meyve verdi. Lord Kaptan'ın halkına hitaben yaptığı konuşma, kolonide {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sistemleriyle son ses yankılandı. Şehirlerdeki işçilere izin verildi; ayrıca erzak, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}kahfe{/g} ve kişisel yakıt hücresi sağlandı. Lord Kaptan'ın merhametinden etkilenen koloni sakinleri, yeni açılmış günah çıkarma merkezlerine akın etti. İsyancılar, tez vakitte büyük şehirlerden çekilmek zorunda kaldı.
languages.original_text: The campaign organised by the esteemed Lord Captain's people took effect. {mf|His|Her} address to {mf|his|her} subjects was broadcast by {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-systems throughout the colony, while workers in towns were granted a shift off work and given provisions, {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}, and personal fuel cells. Moved by the Lord Captain's kindness, the colony inhabitants rushed to the recently established confessional centres. The rebel underground was forced to hastily retreat from the major cities.
